cards.question: In what year was the first Star Wars film released?
cards.hint: It was the same year Saturday Night Fever was released

cards.question: Which two characters are the only ones to appear in every Star Wars film in the Skywalker saga, meaning the three main trilogies?
What is the name of Chewbaccas father?
Where were Luke and Leia Skywalker born?
cards.answer: Polis Massa, the asteroid field in the Outer Rim

cards.question: In Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, what is the name of the Imperial weapons developer who oversees the construction of the Death Star?
cards.hint: He is played by actor Ben Mendelsohn

cards.question: On which planet did Rey and Finn meet in The Force Awakens?
cards.hint: It is a desert planet in the system of the same name

cards.question: Who originally played Obi-Wan Kenobi in the first Star Wars film?
cards.hint: He played Fagin in Oliver Twist
